data.name: Tameshi
data.detailed_description:
Tameshi is a vertical scrolling retro-style 2D shoot 'em up with colorful pixel-art graphics and an emphasis on manic action.

Engage single-player or local couch co-op mode and take on the enemy hoards. Avoid taking fire to build your chain bonus!

Features:

  • Dozens of enemy types
  • 7 stages to conquer
  • Normal and Hard modes
  • 16 avatars to choose from
  • Play with keyboard or gamepad
  • Unique Mini bosses
  • Formidable multi stage bosses
  • Powerful bolt on weapons
  • Bullet hell sections
  • Explosions everywhere!
  • Steam cloud saves

data.short_description: Tameshi is a retro-themed vertical scrolling shoot 'em up for 1 or 2 players (local co-op). Battle through 7 stages of relentless waves of enemies all bent on your destruction. Destroy them first before taking on the end of stage boss.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
